Subskills.name: Conduit
Subskills.description: Increases the mana replenish from mana orb.

Subskills.name: Mana Incursion
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by mana orb.

Subskills.name: Energy Orbit
Subskills.description: Summon multiple mana orbs orbitting you and dealing damage based on your energy. Consumes all of your mana on cast.

Subskills.name: Burst of Energy
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage according to your energy.

Subskills.name: Energy Charges
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of mana orb.

Subskills.name: Corrupting Manapulse
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Meditation
Subskills.description: Reduces the cooldown of mana orb.

Subskills.name: Mage's Might
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of mana orb.

Subskills.name: Compacting Power
Subskills.description: Summon a mana orb with increased duration and size. Each mana pulse now increases its damage but shrinks it in size.

Subskills.name: Amplified Magic
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of mana orb.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Aid
Subskills.description: Chance to summon an additional mana orb at target location on hit.

Subskills.name: Energy Fountain
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Chosen One
Subskills.description: Summon a mana orb within you gaining increased life replenish, mana replenish and arcane damage for the duration of mana orb.

Subskills.name: Hauling Manawell
Subskills.description: Conjure a flying mana orb pulling monsters into its core on hit.
